Package GUI

Class BattleGenerator

java.lang.Object
GUI.BattleGenerator
public class BattleGenerator extends Object
class BattleGenerator, generates battles based on players team.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleGenerator

      public BattleGenerator(Player newPlayer)
      Instantiates a new battle generator.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the new player Sets the local static variables, monsterTeam and difficulty.

  • Method Details

    • generateTeam

      public ArrayList<Monster> generateTeam()
      Generate team. The method generates the team, and returns it for mainscreen to store, and then clears the arrayList.
      Returns:
      an array list of Monsters

    • getWinnings

      public int getWinnings(ArrayList<Monster> monsters)
      Gets the winnings.
      Parameters:
      monsters - the enemy Team of monsters, set to battle the player
      Returns:
      the winnings the amount of gold awarded to player if battle is won

    • generateEnemies

      public static void generateEnemies()
      Generate enemies. Matches the number of monsters in the players Monster Team to get even teams. Calls create enemy and adds the Monster to the enemyTeam

    • createEnemy

      public static Monster createEnemy()
      Creates the enemy. Based on the difficulty chosen by the player, an enemy Monster is randomly generated using helper methods.
      Returns:
      the monster

    • generateName

      public static String generateName()
      Generate name. Chooses the name of the Monster from the local ArrayList of potential Monster names.
      Returns:
      the string

    • checkName

      public static boolean checkName(String potentialName)
      Check name. Checks the given potentialName and returns false if already given to another Monster in the same team or true if name can be given to the Monster
      Parameters:
      potentialName - the potential name
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • random

      public static int random(int min, int max)
      Random. Generates a random number between the given minimum and maximum integers.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum integer
      max - the maximum integer
      Returns:
      the int the randomly generated integer

    • adjustDamageEasy

      public static int adjustDamageEasy()
      Adjust damage easy. Randomly creates the damage of a Monster based on an easy difficulty
      Returns:
      the int the damage given to the Monster

    • adjustHealEasy

      public static int adjustHealEasy()
      Adjust heal easy. Randomly creates the heal amount of a Monster based on an easy difficulty
      Returns:
      the int the heal amount given to the monster

    • adjustDamageMedium

      public static int adjustDamageMedium()
      Adjust damage medium. Randomly creates the damage of a Monster based on a medium difficulty
      Returns:
      the int the damage given to the monster

    • adjustHealMedium

      Adjust heal medium. Randomly creates the heal amount of a Monster based on a medium difficulty
